overview: “I’m Doing My Job” follows 6 South Asian and Black female ER physicians stepping into their power through COVID-19. Whether it’s South Asian mothers being told to quit their jobs, or black and brown women rising up during BLM, or Muslim women finding love amidst a pandemic, “I’m Doing My Job” shows how millennial women of color female physicians showed up for their communities during a time of crisis.
title: I’m Doing My Job
